Text: This is just Safari 5.2.... Safari 6.0 only runs on Mountain Lion and is totally different. I had 5.2, and this version of 6.0(7536-26) is exactly the same. But thanks for the update anyway....im sure some will use this version.
Better way to put it.... anyone that is running Safari 5.1.7...which most are, can install this...its snow leopard and lion friendly and its a great version.
